dialog.text: Finally, the weekend! :partying_face:  I am actually looking forward to going to work - this week has been rough!  You ok today?

I understood almost none of the algos stuff we were supposed to read.  Luckily Jeff had time last night and we worked through some of the problems.  Thanks to Jeff, I managed to answer a question on Arrays vs HashMaps in my meeting this morning - was so chuffed!  Are you doing anything weekend?

joins.text: Try and get out and have some fun.

dialog.text: Pete is going to watch the Ranger's match on tv -  I can't stand football :sleeping: luckily I will be working all weekend :smiley:  Have a good one!
